metadata.synopsis: A Russian gentleman (Timothy Hutton) loves two women (Nastassja Kinski, Valeria Golino) unwisely in 1840 Germany.

reviews: [A] distinguished entry in the lists of Russian literary adaptation.
A beautiful to look at but an embarrassingly awkward and empty tragic 19th-century love tale.
It is a tragic love story told in limp images, its tone a dying sigh, its high points scarcely less nostalgic than the low.
